title: Two Bedroom Apartment for Sale at 2000 Plaza
location: The 2000 Plaza, No 25, New Hospital Road, Kotte
details:
Conveniently located in Kotte within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The apartment offers generous living space along with a total of two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The apartment features a fully fitted pantry with essential electrical appliances. The master bedroom is well designed with a walk-in closet and a spacious attached master bathroom.

The apartment benefits from a range of shared facilities and amenities which include 24 hour security, swimming pool, gym, children’s play area, restaurant, reception hall, spacious roof top terrace with a wonderful view, parking facilities, three lifts, two fire exit stairways, standby generator for the building, regular maintenance and garbage disposal facilities.

- Two bedrooms equipped with furniture and wardrobes.
- Two bathrooms equipped with hot water.
- Air-conditioning units in all bedrooms and living room.
- Furnished living and dining area with terrace offering pleasant view.
- Fully fitted pantry with appliances including oven and cooker.
- Maids room or store room.
Covered parking reserved for one vehicle.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.

Price negotiable upon inspection.
